abstract: Bill Cosby faces new lawsuit from New Hampshire woman Kristina Ruehli, who accused him in 2014 of drugging and sexually assaulting her in 1965; Ruehli contends Cosby wrongly branded her liar after she came forward.
lead_paragraph: Kristina Ruehli, who accused Bill Cosby last year of drugging and sexually assaulting her in 1965, filed a defamation lawsuit in Massachusetts.

headline.main: Bill Cosby Faces New Suit for Saying Accuser Lied
headline.print_headline: Cosby Faces New Suit for Saying Accuser Lied

snippet: Kristina Ruehli, who accused Bill Cosby last year of drugging and sexually assaulting her in 1965, filed a defamation lawsuit in Massachusetts.
